scripts.build: mkdir -p dist &&               npx esbuild ./index.tsx                    --bundle                    --format=esm                    --platform=browser                    --target=es2022                    --external:electron                    --outfile=dist/index.js &&               npm run copy-static
scripts.build:win: if not exist dist mkdir dist &&               npx esbuild ./index.tsx                    --bundle                    --format=esm                    --platform=browser                    --target=es2022                    --external:electron                    --outfile=dist/index.js &&               npm run copy-static:win
scripts.dev: npx concurrently -n esbuild,static -c cyan,green                 "npx esbuild ./index.tsx                      --bundle                      --format=esm                      --platform=browser                      --target=es2022                      --external:electron                      --outfile=dist/index.js                      --watch"                 "npx chokidar '../../index.html' '../../assets/**/*' -c 'npm run copy-static' --initial"
scripts.dev:win: npx concurrently -n esbuild,static -c cyan,green                 "npx esbuild ./index.tsx                      --bundle                      --format=esm                      --platform=browser                      --target=es2022                      --external:electron                      --outfile=dist/index.js                      --watch"                 "npx chokidar '../../index.html' '../../assets/**/*' -c 'npm run copy-static:win' --initial"
scripts.copy-static: mkdir -p dist && cp -f ../../index.html dist/ && cp -R ../../assets dist/
scripts.copy-static:win: powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path 'dist')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'dist' }; Copy-Item '../../index.html' 'dist/' -Force; if (Test-Path '../../assets') { Copy-Item '../../assets' 'dist/' -Recurse -Force }"
